text.autoconfig.craftgr.title: CraftGR Config
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.volume.@T: Playback Volume of the Gensokyo Radio music.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.overlayVi: Option for when the song overlay is visible.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.overlayPo: Option for where to display the song info overlay at.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.openAlbum: Click Overlay to Open Album Info
Whether to open the album info webpage or not when clicking the song overlay.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.hideAlbum: Whether to hide the album cover image or not in the song info overlay.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.overlayBg: Background color of the song info overlay.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.overlayBa: Progress bar color of the song info overlay.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.overlaySc: How large the song info overlay should be displayed.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.url.strea: URL to stream audio from. Only works with MP3 streams.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.url.songI: URL to get song info from.
text.autoconfig.craftgr.option.url.album: URL to get album cover images from.
